Bug fixes
The recent annoying and awful bug fixed. Sorry for that guys. ><
We have fixed some tiny bugs now and hope you guys enjoy the app! Have a good day!
Bug fixes and other minor improvements
bug fixes

*Find A Match*
We improved our dating service with automatic moderation, so you could see only real people. If somehow you face an issue with your photo, don't be upset (machines aren't perfect), send it to us to moderate it manually, and we will get back to you shortly.
*Safe mode*
This new feature allows to hide some content that doesn't break the rules but can be considered sensitive. It can be found in Privacy Settings. It's on for all newcomers by default.
*Tank fixed*
Finally, we eliminated the bug in the Tank object. Now you can drive it on Planet easily.
*Some minor bugs fixed*
Small bugs and drawbacks happen all the time, and we constantly work on fixing them, so you could enjoy chatting in chat rooms and play online games.

*Find A Match*
We improved our dating service with automatic moderation, so you could see only real people. If somehow you face an issue with your photo, don't be upset (machines aren't perfect), send it to us to moderate it manually, and we will get back to you shortly.
*Safe mode*
This new feature allows to hide some content that doesn't break the rules but can be considered sensitive. It can be found in Privacy Settings. It's on for all newcomers by default.
*Tank fixed*
Finally, we eliminated the bug in the Tank object. Now you can drive it on Planet easily.
*Some minor bugs fixed*
Small bugs and drawbacks happen all the time, and we constantly work on fixing them, so you could enjoy chatting in chat rooms and play online games.

*Approved accounts*
You could notice a green tick in Info of some users and in the Find A Match section. That means their account is verified.
*Reports update*
From now on you can report messages on game and prison planets. You will be able to send a report even if the violator has already left the planet.
*Minor bugs fixed*
Bugs appear all the time and we learn about them from you, so thanks for making our app better.

We added tags that make it easier for you to find Planets with interesting themes. Select Go to another Planet - Popular and see what tags are trending now.
We also fixed some small bugs you reported to us.
You can criticize or compliment us on our Facebook page here - https://www.facebook.com/GalaxyChat/ and report bugs or troubles to our email - support@mobstudio.ru.

Lots of minor improvements including highly improved quality of uploaded images in the Find A Match services.
Thanks for using the Galaxy chat! As always, we love hearing what you think, so please consider leaving a review!
Stability and perfromance improvements to make chatting and more connvenient.

This update includes minor bug fixes.
Please report any bugs in the Help section in the app or by email at support@mobstudio.ru.
We are always happy to receive your reviews on App Store!

Boo!
We are almost ready for upcoming Halloween... And you?
Celebrate with us! Festive content, spooky games and much more are waiting for you in Galaxy!
Plus, in this update we made some performance improvements and fixed tiny bugs.
Enjoy Galaxy!

The Galaxy team

We tried to make the app stay online in the background for as long as possible. We hope, it works :)
Please send your feedback in the Help section or by email - support@mobstudio.ru.

Holiday update!
Check out our special winter design of main menu. This has never been before!
And the holiday section is open! Have fun!

P.S. We also fixed crashes in background on iOS7 + bug when notifications were not delivered in background.
Dark keyboard for dark color scheme added

The constant loading bug has been fixed.
Plus, your keyboard won't be colored in different colors after hide the app on the background. Fixed too.
Bug fixes and other minor improvements

- 18 new smileys
- Animated Auras for Guardian and Emperor
- New Weather on Planet: lightning and fog (snow and rain look much better too)
- Smoother and faster switch between pages

The crash in background is fixed. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
